title: Meghan Markle's co-star shares unseen photos of Duchess of Sussex from 'Suits'
text:
It's been two years since Meghan Markle quit her role as Rachel Zane on the U.S. show "Suits" in order to start a new life as a royal.

On Monday, ahead of the show's final episode later this week, her former co-star Patrick J. Adams shared a series of unseen snaps of the Duchess of Sussex on set in her pre-royal days.

Adams, who played Duchess Meghan’s on-screen husband Michael Ross, shared a total of 11 posts on Instagram to mark the occasion.

'SUITS' POKES FUN AT ALUM MEGHAN MARKLE'S ROYAL ROLE

MEGHAN MARKLE'S 'SUITS' CO-STAR PATRICK J. ADAMS CONGRATULATES DUCHESS OF SUSSEX, PRINCE HARRY ON ROYAL BABY

Captioning the first, which sees him posing in a suit, he wrote: “This week the last episode of 'Suits' will air and the nearly 10-year journey we’ve all been on together will finally be over.

“So it seems right to post some photos the next couple of days from the early days. This photo was from the first fitting I ever had for Mike Ross.”

The fourth post featured a snap of his former co-star Duchess Meghan posing with her script in a filtered snap which he simply captioned with her character’s initials "RZ."

'SUITS' FINALE TO PAY TRIBUTE TO MEGHAN MARKLE, CO-STAR SAYS

MEGHAN MARKLE'S ONSCREEN FATHER FROM 'SUITS' SENDS 'BLESSINGS' AHEAD OF ROYAL BABY'S BIRTH

He went on to share several more behind-the-scenes snaps of the cast, including several more of Duchess Meghan.

A second shot saw the dressed-down actress wearing a tank top as she posed outside her trailer.

He went on to share several snaps of Prince Harry’s wife posing on the set of a photo shoot, including one that saw her lounging on a sofa in a pencil skirt and heels.

In the same post, he added a black-and-white picture of Duchess Meghan dressed in a bathrobe and a pair of stilettos.

MEGHAN MARKLE WON'T RETURN FOR FINAL SEASON OF 'SUITS'

MEGHAN MARKLE HAD BRITISH SECURITY WITH HER ON 'SUITS' SET

Several other shots show Meghan alongside former co-star Sarah Rafferty, who plays Donna Paulsen on the legal drama, as well as a whole cast group photo.

Meanwhile, another candid shot saw Duchess Meghan taking a stroll with an umbrella during a rainy day in Toronto, where the show was filmed.

MEGHAN MARKLE STRUGGLES WITH INTENSITY OF THE SPOTLIGHT, ROYAL EXPERT SAYS

The 38-year-old left "Suits" in 2017 with her final episode airing in April last year, just a month before she wed Prince Harry.

Duchess Meghan's co-stars were invited to her wedding at Windsor Castle in May 2018, and some also made the guest list at her lavish baby shower in New York.

MEGHAN MARKLE WAS A 'FAILURE' IN HOLLYWOOD BEFORE 'SUITS'

MEGHAN MARKLE WASN'T A-LIST ENOUGH FOR DESIGNERS TO DRESS HER PRE-PRINCE HARRY

In other royal news, we told you how Meghan and Harry made a secret $5,400 donation in four-month-old Archie's name to help build a Mozambique swimming pool.

Plus, we shared how the Duchess of Sussex will speak out on gender violence while on her royal tour to South Africa with Harry.
